Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Washington
ShortDescription: #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton and Damen due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Damen, Madison, Western, Fulton, then resume their normal route on Damen.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near Damen/Washington.

Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute near 59th/Springfield
ShortDescription: #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage, near 59th/Springfield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage, near 59th/Springfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 59th, Pulaski, 55th, Kedzie, 59th, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via 59th, Kedzie, 55th, Pulaski, 59th, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.
